title: Integrated Simulation Task Design for Improving Oral English Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary knowledge, educational field experience
context.additional_context: Course for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers to Improve Job Competencies. Combining Smartphone-Based Online Activities and Face-to-Face Instruction. Measuring Learning Achievement Through Summative Assessment

learning_goals: Learners improve fluency by 30% or more when performing tasks simulating real classroom situations.
Learners can improve grammatical accuracy (Accuracy) in language use by 25%
Learners can utilize over 15 expressions reflecting linguistic complexity (Complexity) in diverse discourse contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
